fixes.name: Delta Down T FX
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR fxSelection = SELECTEDVALUE('FXConversion'[Display As])
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    fxSelection = "Reported", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T],
    fxSelection = "Natural",
        SWITCH(
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[marketCCY],
            "AUD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_AUD],
            "BRL", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_BRL],
            "BRO", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_BRO],
            "CAD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CAD],
            "CHF", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CHF],
            "CLF", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CLF],
            "CLP", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CLP],
            "CNH", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CNH],
            "COP", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_COP],
            "CRC", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CRC],
            "EUR", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_EUR],
            "GBP", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_GBP],
            "HKD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_HKD],
            "INR", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_INR],
            "JPY", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_JPY],
            "KRW", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_KRW],
            "MXN", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MXN],
            "MXC", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MXC],
            "MEX", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MEX],
            "MYR", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MYR],
            "NZD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_NZD],
            "PEN", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_PEN],
            "SEK", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_SEK],
            "SGD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_SGD],
            "USD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_USD],
            "UVR", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_UVR],
            "UYU", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_UYU],
            BLANK()
        ),
    fxSelection = "CAD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CAD],
    fxSelection = "USD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_USD],
    fxSelection = "EUR", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_EUR],
    fxSelection = "GBP", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_GBP],
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('FXConversion'[Display As]). Implemented the outer CASE using SWITCH(TRUE(), ...) and the nested marketCCY CASE with an inner SWITCH. Transformed all field references to the 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName] format and used BLANK() for null/else branches.
